titleStmt.title: Dauisons poems, or, A poeticall rapsodie Deuided into sixe bookes. The first, contayning poems and deuises. The second, sonets and canzonets. The third, pastoralls and elegies. The fourth, madrigalls and odes. The fift, epigrams and epitaphs. The sixt, epistles, and epithalamions. For variety and pleasure, the like neuer published.
Poetical rapsody
titleStmt.author: Davison, Francis, 1575?-1619?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by B[ernard] A[lsop] for Roger Iackson,

notesStmt.note: Includes poems by numerous other authors.
Originally published in 1602 as: A poetical rapsody.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
